name: Football Pools Generator
description:
Game created by Glenjamin Software for ZX Spectrum 128 +3

Once downloaded.  unzip and load this as a ZX Spectrum +3 Disk and run with Tape Loader.

Football Prediction Generator (FPG) will generate 5-10 balls of numbers from 1-77.

After it draws the numbers it will either tell you to either place then on HOME, AWAY or DRAW.

Hope you enjoy.

Glenjamin
